title: metaQuantome 3: Taxonomy
questions: How do I look at differentially expressed taxa?
Can we get top 5 or 10 taxa present in the sample?
How can I visualize my results?
objectives: A taxonomy and quantitational analysis of metaproteomic mass spectrometry data.
key_points: All the inputs should have one column in common i.e. peptides.
Learning different tools such as Unipept, MEGAN, MetaGOmics etc. for taxonomic annotation of peptides will benefit.

workflows.name: metaquantome-taxonomy-workflow
workflows.title: metaquantome-taxonomy-workflow
